properties.name: logging.gelf.server
properties.description: The host name or IP address of the GELF server.

properties.name: logging.gelf.port
properties.description: The port the GELF server is listening on.

properties.name: logging.gelf.includeLevelName
properties.description: Whether the log level's name should be included, e.g. 'WARN', 'INFO' ...

properties.name: logging.gelf.service
properties.description: The service name to include along with each gelf log.
